revised_title: The Enzymes Concerned in the Decomposition of Glucose and Mannitol by Bacillus coli communis: Part III - Various Phases in the Decomposition of Glucose by an Emulsion of the Organisms
tldr: The author investigates the enzymes involved in the decomposition of glucose and mannitol by Bacillus coli communis, focusing on the various phases of glucose decomposition. The study uses an emulsion of the organisms and examines the fermentation process at different time intervals, providing insights into enzyme action and bacterial fermentation.
